22 single_crochet 9 9 23 decrease 1 single_crochet 1 x3 fo 6 a leave a longer tail for sewing around 8-10in finish stuffing ©2023aybeecreates lankyfoxcrochetpattern sewing guide 1 start by sewing on the head to the body use the orange tail from the body to sew on the back half matching the orange stitches to the orange part of the head tie off and hide yarn inside the body use the white tail to sew on the front half of the body matching to white stitches tie off and hide the yarn ©2023aybeecreates lankyfoxcrochetpattern 2 for the ears sew the edges of the opening together and then sew the ears onto the head around the 10th row as pictured tie off and hide the extra yarn 3 sew the edges of all the leg openings together in a similar manner to the ears sew the bottom two legs along the 5th row of the body close but not touching the white part tie off and hide the extra yarn 4 sew the
